name: redis-wrapper
description: Provides a simple class/mixin as base for when you need to wraps a redis client (or provide API that does) via a use() method

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test mocha --timeout 100 --require coffee-script --reporter spec --compilers coffee:coffee-script test/*

author: Chakrit Wichian <service@chakrit.net> (http://chakrit.net)
